buttons.name: Create Null
buttons.description: Creates a new Null Object layer in the active composition.
buttons.script: var comp = app.project.activeItem; if (comp && comp instanceof CompItem) { comp.layers.addNull(); } else { alert('Please select a composition.'); }
buttons.author: John Doe

buttons.name: Toggle Shy Layers
buttons.description: Shows or hides all shy layers in the active comp.
buttons.script: var comp = app.project.activeItem; if (comp && comp instanceof CompItem) { comp.hideShyLayers = !comp.hideShyLayers; }
buttons.author: Jane Smith

buttons.name: Center Anchor Point
buttons.description: Centers the anchor point for all selected layers.
buttons.script: var selectedLayers = app.project.activeItem.selectedLayers; if (selectedLayers.length > 0) { app.executeCommand(app.findMenuCommandId('Center Anchor Point in Layer Content')); } else { alert('Please select at least one layer.'); }
buttons.author: Community
